text: 18.10-11: Stt 48.16 naŋga, Sng 34.7 naŋga, Lu 19.10 naŋga, Jo 3.17 naŋga, 12.47 naŋga, Hi 1.14Narɨ indarɨmara. Ñɨŋi sukɨsɨrambɨ nɨñɨndu munɨrɨm nda, ñɨmbi manɨman saŋ vɨtɨrama. Narɨŋ yinda ambin, Gotɨndu pɨhuyɨ, ñɨŋi kanɨŋɨnɨŋɨndu kutɨkara haŋɨnɨŋ, Yavandak nuŋandɨ pɨhuyɨ kɨyɨ hama naŋga sɨhaŋgɨndu, vami.18.10-11 Kru indarɨmit avi naŋga muvɨra ambandu. Kuyu mu ndahara kanɨñɨ kɨyɨ. Jisas ambami, Krundu Ñɨŋi hama krunavundi ñamba vana andɨta siŋgundɨmu haŋɨnɨŋ aŋga mɨŋɨrɨm payɨmi, vamba ambami, vandu.
